divs: Sighting DetailsENTER I was letting dog out at dawn.Saw bright light hovering ESE of house atabout 40,000 ft. Lt. cloud cover. Extremely bright shimmering lites. It wasselongated spindle shape. Magenta periphery. Like bright diamond necklace.Viewed thru 7x35 binoculars did not change shape26 seen below lite cloud cover. 1 hour later, seen in sky only thru binocs. Sameshape, same area. No movement or orbital path. As sun came up it faded and thendisappeared. My cousin saw same event thru same binocs. Later disappeared aboveheavier strato-cumulous YOUR NARRATIVE DESCRIPTION HEREPlease limit yournarrative to 500 words (equivalent to 1 typed page).
